title: Delicious Sin
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Uuu, Ai-san.... because we did our secret “Rice and Pickles” meeting so much.... I’ve gotten a little chubby.... What should I do!? Nico-chan is going to be mad at me because I’m not responsible enough~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Leave it to me, Hanayo! You can lose that much with a bit of running.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Really!? Is that really true!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah! So let’s go running with me♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>O-, okay, let’s!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright. So first, we’ll go from Nijigaku, then across The Rainbow Bridge....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>“Across”? Not “until” The Rainbow Bridge....? Eh....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>The view you’ll see when going across it is the best, you know? Enough to blow away all of your fatigue! That’s why we’ll charge up there and head for Tokyo Tower~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeeh!? Wait, wait! Not even Umi-chan or Eli-chan would go that far!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, then this will be your first time, huh, Hanayo! It’s so much fun that it’ll pass by in no time! Ai is itching to get started! Let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
